thread.title: Kenneth Alessi
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Kenneth Alessi

author: Kenneth Alessi
title: Kenneth Alessi
text: i went looking for a set that was out of stock and they sold a much much better outfit for around the same price i had the salesman was very friendly the delivery was on time and when i had a miss understanding hey sent a tech to take care of it very fast
